Text:

Cast: Tallie Cochrane ... Rita (as Dandy Thomas)

Description: 

After returning from a tour of duty in Vietnam, Peter experiences difficulties satisfying Rita in the
bedroom. Hoping to rediscover their previous sexual passion, they embark on a series of sexual adventures, including
orgies, bride-swapping and even more.
